level.heading: Reorganization.
level.text: The Director of DDOT is authorized to organize the personnel and property transferred herein within any organizational unit of DDOT as the Director deems appropriate.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-137
level.text: For Law 14-137, see notes following ยง 50-921.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-354
level.text: For Law 15-354, see notes following ยง 50-319.
